channel.title: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*
channel.description:
alright, so i have a moparscape cape here is a pix:
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/mopar.jpg[/img]
how do i get the INTS for the .mqo..please help meh :)? thanks.

item.title: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*
item.dc:creator: @Sherman Sherman
item.description:
@Sherman wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:6, topic:283444”][quote author=Sherman link=topic=374550.msg2824164#msg2824164 date=1244850692]

1st of all… it needs to be animated… 2nd… it must be .dat not .mqo…

how u do that st00f :)? my friend made it and sent it to me…but never taught me how to animate it and everything.
[/quote]

You’re friend sent it to you? Whats his name? Moparscape Name…[/quote]

i got i animated it and everything it’s all good.

Read full topic
item.source: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*

item.title: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I got these ints from a present skillcape, the ints should match with your skillcape fairly good.

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 940; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 930; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 930; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 940; class8.anInt174 = Inv and drop id; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = Male look; class8.anInt200 = Female look; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Skillcape name goes here"; class8.aByteArray178 = "examine message goes here.".getBytes(); }

the only thing you need to change is:
examine info
male view (this is the wear model)
female view (wear model)
drop and inv model (this is easy to make, rotate your wear model, and make it level with the floor and boom)

Read full topic
item.source: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*

item.title: *[HELP] how to get ints for a custom item made?*
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

animating a cape is fairly hard… and i have not figured it out yet… but making it into a .dat should be done with a datmaker
also you will need to make that .dat into a gzipped file… all of this is tought in CJ’s tut
